game_description: A lightning-fast action VR platformer in which the enemy always outnumbers you, and the cost of a mistake is death. Slice your way through a utopian city, shredding heavily armed opponents with a deadly katana in a stylish super-fast manner. Hone your skills with each kill. Find hidden ways to complete each level and get a higher score with a medal! BETA CONTENT Right now, there is one available realm with multiple levels and regular enemies. PLANNED CONTENT It is planned that the game will contain various realms of an alternative Japan, and the player will be able to fight their way through all of them, from the feudal era to the futuristic shiny skyscrapers. All the realms are connected by core gameplay mechanics and a narrative. Each realm will contain: ⭘ An interactive city map ⭘ A unique boss ⭘ 20 platforming levels with side quests, puzzles, and a wide range of challenges for all types of players. As the game progresses and the player gains experience, new realms with stronger opponents and a more complicated level design will become available. Also, the game will change visually, narrative- and gameplay-wise in each realm. The further you progress through the game, the more interactive elements inside your mansion will become available - practice throwing shurikens, play with a cat, have Sushi, learn the art of calligraphy, and much more! Many different physics-based mini-games will be available to you in addition to the main gameplay
review_4: This game is almost perfect. I believe the full release will top it off and make it oneof my favorite games on quest. The idea of a fast paced movement based game in vr has been something I have wanted for a while so this game fits that perfectly. I have a few questions but its fine if devs dont see this/ cant answer for any reason. Is the game going to be free on full release? Will there be any story to go with it? My last question is will there be any more weapons? I have not gotten very far. Just passed the deflect levels but I read about the shurikens. That is all thank you for your time and thank you for reading. Have a nice day.
review_5: For whatever reason, I am completely unable to progress from level one despite completing everything there is to do. I finish the level and return to the home but the figure isn't able to be moved to the next level, aside from this issue the game is really fun and a great way to kill time as its fast paced and full of action.
